episodes.title: Survivors of the Message Cult | Interview with Jennifer Collins
episodes.description:
I had the privilege of interviewing Jennifer Collins, a former Message believer who left when she was 40 years old. In this video she shares about her faith journey before and after leaving the Message.

Jennifer Collins hosts a talk show! On YouTube or online:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL-dhzfp_gxGf0HR6sX8U8L1UuGvkPUf8j&si=7jD1T_NX5MqjMbft 
https://freeandclearshow.com/#podcast 

Jen's husband's (John Collins) channel: https://www.youtube.com/@LeavingtheMessage

Other links:
My Blog: https://crwottrich.com/

episodes.title: Survivors of the Message Cult | Interview with Hope Makola
episodes.description:
My name is Charity Wottrich, and in this video I will be interviewing Hope Makola, who also grew up in the Message cult. She grew up in South Africa, but her story has many parallels to my own experiences with William Branham's cult. 

Hope also interviewed me on her channel which you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/@HopeMakola


Important links:
